stuffs.title: Dopplr API
stuffs.text:
Even if Dopplr has been bought by Nokia and they stop the development of the website and API, I'm still using it (when I remember using it).
Traveller Tanaki

I've built a small Flash App, but I'm planning to create a proper Android App someday...

stuffs.title: This Website
stuffs.text:
This website is based on a quick boilerplate for Backbone JS I've been working on. You can see and fork the project on Github.

It also uses the sweet vectorial drawing library Raphael JS. Take a look at Mindreader, which is a commercial project I've built with Raphael JS too.

Github repository

stuffs.title: Current and Next Projects
stuffs.text:
These days I'm working on CSS3 Animations, AS3 (PureMVC), AMD Architecture on Javascript.

My next projects involve : Java for Android, WebGL, Kinect, Arduino + Twitter API, Tangible objects…

stuffs.title: Node JS and Now JS
stuffs.text: This is a quick experiment I've made at Pirata. It uses Now JS to create a real time communication between different client instances of a Node JS Server (even using two different interfaces).
